thread.section_title: RushPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushPassport.com | rushpassport.com
thread.title: Sandra

author: Sandra
title: Sandra
text: Having my passport stolen was an unnerving and frustrating experience. Besides the great, fast service that RushPassport provided, it was their team that really stood out. They deserve 10 stars! Sam, Tanja, Roman, everyone was really kind, empathetic and went the extra mile to figure things out and were constantly available by phone and email. If you want someone who cares about YOU and your needs, this is the team to turn to for help.
